s0383: They killed King You at the foot of Li Mountain, captured Bao Si, took all Zhou's treasures and left.
s0384: Therefore the lords went to Shen Hou and together established the former King You's crown prince Yi Jiu, this was King Ping, to continue the Zhou sacrifices.
s0385: King Ping ascended, moved east to Luoyi, to avoid the Rong invaders.
s0386: In King Ping's time, the Zhou house declined and weakened, the lords strong annexed the weak, Qi, Chu, Qin, Jin began to grow great, government was by the regional lords.
